Module it.polimi.ingsw.client.view
Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.layouts

Class Group

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.layouts.Layout
it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.layouts.Group
public class Group extends Layout
This class includes two different common goals: 1. the common goal with six groups of at least two equal items 2. the common goal with four groups of at least four equal items

  • Constructor Details

    • Group

      public Group(int minDifferent, int maxDifferent, int occurrences, int size) throws IllegalArgumentException
      This method creates a group layout.
      Parameters:
      minDifferent - the minimum number of different colors in the layout.
      maxDifferent - the maximum number of different colors in the layout.
      occurrences - the number of occurrences of the layout.
      size - the size of the group.
      Throws:
      IllegalArgumentException - if the parameters are invalid.
